summary: Moderate air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 24 November to end of Wednesday 24 November GMT
description: Forecast update morning Wednesday 24th November.<br/><br/>Very light winds are resulting in poor dispersion of locally-emitted pollutants, most notably PM10 Particulates. <br/><br/>With still weather conditions forecast to continue for the remainder of the day, it's likely that 'Moderate' levels of PM10, and possibly PM2.5 Particulates as well, will occur close to some busy roads.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
